page.title: 19GtHarrowden Resident,Finedon
page.content: We were interviewing an old lady from Hill Top. she has lived there since 1929, she came from Finedon. When she was first there they had no electricity. They were connected in 1939. They had no water and there was no kitchen when they first moved in. They washed their clothes in the wash house.The bedroom is downstairs. They had to go 2 or 3 miles to the shops. She travelled by bus and it was mostly full.The bus was very frequent. Years ago Old doctor Burton used to come when needed by horse and cart.
